data.name: PAYDAY 2: Lost in Transit Heist
data.detailed_description: Our second Texas assignment from Gemma McShay. Gemma has uncovered information about a highly valuable shipment on its way from Fort Worth that she’d like intercepted. Grabbing the cargo and getting away clean shouldn’t be a problem for the Payday Gang.
data.about_the_game: Our second Texas assignment from Gemma McShay. Gemma has uncovered information about a highly valuable shipment on its way from Fort Worth that she’d like intercepted. Grabbing the cargo and getting away clean shouldn’t be a problem for the Payday Gang.
data.short_description: The Lost in Transit Heist is available on its own or as part of the Lost in Transit Bundle.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows 7
  • Processor:2 GHz Intel Dual Core Processor
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia & AMD (512MB VRAM)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Storage:83 GB available space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows 10
  • Processor:2.3 GHz Intel Quad Core Processor
  • Memory:8 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia & AMD (1GB VRAM)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Storage:83 GB available space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible
